tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Get ready to read (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  TOUGH GRADER
comments: Attendance was mandatory, but you wont get anything out of attending class as there are no lectures and no actual teaching of the material. Instead you work on your own in the book, which is only online, and pretty much look up the answers. The work isn\'t hard, just annoying. Having an instructor who actually showed you how to do things would help.

comments: Does not directly help when questions are asked. Program used is flawed and confusing.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Get ready to read (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
Tough Grader (2)  Get ready to read (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Very helpful, lenient and will let you catch up with past due work. The assignments were probably harder than the finals:)I got an A in the class.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Get ready to read (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: He\'s fun, patient, approachable, helpful, and sometimes flexible about deadlines. I really like how he spends plenty of time going over programming examples during the class. He\'s also very clear about what he expects in homework and very organized. If only he taught the Web design classes too!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Get ready to read (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
Tough Grader (2)  Get ready to read (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: He was very helpful and flexible with doing the assignments. Would recommend this teacher for taking computer classes.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Get ready to read (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)
comments: Very good teacher. He helps you with whatever you need. He is very lenient with classwork as long as you dont take advantage of him. He lets you skip class if you work ahead. I already knew some stuff about computers so it wasnt very hard for me, but the students who didnt know so much usually got a good grade and understood the work if they tried.
